14.content:
I am from a nation called Tutelia,the war in the two centuries past has weakened the economy of the Tutelian people,the rise to power of an authoritative overlord broke the unity of the people and rendered the people distrustful of themselves,our love for one another decreased greatly as families broke into factions and fought against themselves,as humans it is our duty to encourage peace and love among the people,the Peace federation employed us from different tribes and countries ensuring that we start from the high offices beforw we get to the families.
It was not easy for me especially because I am a female,the people see females as lesser to men and this is another big source of trouble especially in a third world country,although there are organisations all around the world fighting for women rights and a means for development but they are being hampered by the traditions and laws of the third world countries that they have to respect and follow. I walked into my office seeing files of public complaints on my desk against a remote area in one of the Tutelian states,my secretary sat at her desk typing memos and response to the compliants while I went through the files on my table,the government requested for a meeting woth me concerning the bringing of peace into Tutelia but as I have been warned before,the authoritative government cannot be trusted in anyway so I have to be extra cautious so as not to harm myself and the people I fight for,in a way,I am a hero,because I am a freedom fighter who works for a non-governmental organisation,this is seen as the beginning of peace by the Tutelian people who were not educated,the economy situation was so bad that the schools had to close down because there was no way for the government to be at war and at the same time support the sector,I rose from my desk and put on my suit,getting ready to meet with the government to discuss a new dawn for the Tutelian people.
14.title: humans

info.brief_description: your story in the perfect world
info.description:
you are an adventurer in the world of perfect world international.

will you become almighty or stay a simple peasent.

rules:
-no sex
-no permanent dying
-no family except for siblings within your characters age bracket
-no gayness what so ever

you can use any of the special functions found within the game but you must do it in a non technical way that makes sense

have fun and rise to power!
